resources.string:
1. What does this app do? 
 			 This app delivers messages sent to you by an organization providing you services. 

 2. How do I view my messages? 
 			 When a message comes in, you should see it listed in your "notifications" screen. If you click on it, it should bring you to the full message. At this point, you'll see the message, and possibly buttons that take you to complete a short survey, and/or a map. 

 3. Why aren't there any messages in my "notifications" screen? 
 			 Your organization may not have sent you any messages yet. Be patient! If your organization says they've sent you a message, and you haven't received it, please report it to your Mobile4All Mobile Mentor (if applicable). 

 4. Who do I contact about receiving help? 
 			 Allan Baez is the coordinator for this project. Please call him at (408) 451-0734 or email him at allan@sparrowmobile.com.
